description:
When users encounter permission-denied errors, explain specifically what permission is needed, why they don't have it, and provide a button to request access from the appropriate person.

**Rationale:** Generic 'Access Denied' messages leave users stuck without recourse. They don't know who to contact or what to request. This creates help desk tickets and workflow bottlenecks for time-sensitive tasks.
title: Permission Denial Explanations with Request Access
